QuestData.Title: Booty Duty
QuestData.Description: Let's not be wasteful here, babe. These pirates have tons of valuable nonsense just sitting around, waiting to be fenced. Can you believe they just sit on this stuff?$B$BI mean, why do they even bother taking it if it's just going to sit around? Stolen goods should be sold off and used to buy shiny new things.$B$BAnyway, be a dear and go grab as much of their loot as you can carry while you're out busting heads. Ciao!
QuestData.CompletionText: Let's see what you've got. You're not hiding any for yourself, are you? You'll never find a buyer without me, you know.
QuestData.RewardText: Beautiful! And to think these idiots were just sitting on it.$B$BHere's a bit up front, we'll talk about profit-sharing bonuses later.
